name: The Living Room
subtitle: A room that grows items over time...
specialContainmentProcedure:
SCP-002 is to remain connected to a suitable power supply at all times,
to keep it in recharging mode.

Teams including a minimum of two members
are required within 20 meters of SCP-002 or its containment area.

No personnel below Level 3 are permitted within SCP-002
without written authorization.
description:
SCP-002 resembles a tumorous, fleshy growth with a volume of roughly 60 m³.
The interior appears to be a standard low-rent apartment
with furniture made of biological substances.
reference:
Subject responsible for the disappearances of seven personnel.
Tests with lab animals and cadavers
have failed to provoke a response in SCP-002.
Mulhausen Report docid:00.023.603

name: Biological Motherboard
subtitle: A complex biological machine...
specialContainmentProcedure:
SCP-003 must be maintained at a temperature above 35°C
and ideally kept over 100°C.
In case of power failure,
personnel must engage in skin contact with SCP-003-1
to maintain critical temperature.
All personnel entering SCP-003's area must be examined
for body parasites and sterilized if necessary.
description:
SCP-003 consists of two components:
SCP-003-1, a sentient organism resembling a circuit board,
and SCP-003-2, a stone tablet with unknown runes.
SCP-003-1 grows rapidly when the temperature drops below 35°C,
converting matter around it and interacting with living organisms.

addendum.title: Addendum: 003-01
addendum.content:
SCP-003-1 is now considered sentient
and must be kept a minimum of 1 km from
[DATA EXPUNGED].

addendum.title: Addendum: 003-03
addendum.content:
During a procedure, SCP-003-1 doubled in mass
and breached containment,
forming a humanoid shape before being re-contained.

addendum.title: Addendum: 003-05
addendum.content:
O5-10 was removed from the O5 Council
following containment breach.
M03-Gloria procedures are suspended.

name: The 12 Rusty Keys and the Door
subtitle: A set of keys that unlocks various anomalies...
specialContainmentProcedure:
SCP-004-2 through SCP-004-13 must not be moved off-site
unless escorted by two Level 4 personnel.
No other component of SCP-004 should be taken through SCP-004-1.
Level 1 clearance is needed for access,
while Level 4 is required for using SCP-004-2 to SCP-004-13.
description:
SCP-004 consists of an old wooden barn door (SCP-004-1)
and twelve rusted steel keys (SCP-004-2 to SCP-004-13).
The door is the entrance to an abandoned factory.
chronologicalHistory:
07/02/1949:
Three juveniles discover SCP-004
and a set of rusted keys. One juvenile goes missing.

07/03/1949:
The severed hand of SCP-004-CAS01 is found,
leading to an SCP Foundation investigation.
spaceTimeAnomalies:
SCP-004 causes spatiotemporal anomalies,
including the reappearance of remains exactly ██ years after initial exposure.
SCP-004-7 opens an area larger than its physical size.
additionalNotes:
Testing reveals that ten of the keys
open SCP-004-1 to dimensions with altered physics.
Some test subjects are torn apart
and scattered across unknown locations.

appendix.title: Appendix A: Mental Health Effects of SCP-004-12
appendix.content:
Class D personnel exposed to SCP-004-12
exhibit catatonic behavior and psychological trauma.
One survivor described seeing a massive green creature.

appendix.title: Appendix B: Additional Information
content:
SCP-004-14 is a wooden box that can be unlocked by SCP-004-7.
Items placed inside vanish when the lid is closed.

name: Skeleton Key
subtitle: A key that can open any lock...
specialContainmentProcedure:
SCP-005 poses no immediate risk,
but requires approval from Level 4 personnel for removal from containment.
description:
SCP-005 resembles a key from the 1920s.
It has the unique ability to open any lock, mechanical or digital,
though the origin of this ability is unknown.
additionalNotes:
SCP-005 may only be used under supervision of Level 4 personnel.
It is forbidden for personal use or non-essential purposes.

appendix.title: Appendix A: Locking Mechanism Behavior
appendix.content:
SCP-005 can open most locks,
but disguised locks may sometimes prevent it from working.
Experiments suggest SCP-005 may be tentatively classified as 'sentient,'
though further tests are required to confirm its cognitive abilities.

name: Fountain of Youth
subtitle: A fountain with rejuvenating properties...
specialContainmentProcedure:
Secrecy is essential to prevent knowledge of SCP-006's effects.
Personnel interacting with SCP-006 must wear Class VI BNC suits,
be briefed with false information,
and follow strict containment protocols.
Liquid extraction must be approved by O5-level personnel
and handled with care.
Personnel who come into contact with SCP-006
are to be terminated after studies are completed.
description:
SCP-006 is a small spring located west of Astrakhan.
The liquid from SCP-006, though chemically similar to mineral water,
has regenerative properties, enhancing DNA repair,
cellular duplication, and the immune system.
It has been shown to destroy harmful bacteria and viruses,
though the effects vary across different species.
